pandas.replace_code:
def pivot_table(
    data,
    values=None,
    index=None,
    columns=None,
    aggfunc="mean",
    fill_value=None,
    margins=False,
    dropna=True,
    margins_name="All",
    observed=False,
) -> pd.DataFrame:
    import pandas as pd
    table = pd.pivot_table(
        data,
        values=values,
        index=index,
        columns=columns,
        aggfunc=aggfunc,
        fill_value=fill_value,
        margins=margins,
        dropna=dropna,
        observed=observed,
    )
    
    # If multi-index columns, convert to DataFrame for consistency
    if isinstance(table, pd.Series):
        table = table.to_frame()
    
    return table
